drawMode

drawMode: number

Controls the draw mode of the material (one of gl.POINTS, gl.LINES, gl.LINE_STRIP, gl.LINE_LOOP, gl.TRIANGLES, gl.TRIANGLE_STRIP, gl.TRIANGLE_FAN)
